description:
The Centre for Long-Term Resilience (CLTR) has called for a comprehensive incident reporting system to urgently address a critical gap in AI regulation plans. According to the CLTR, AI has a history of failing in unexpected ways, with over 10,000 safety incidents recorded by news outlets in deployed AI systems since 2014. As AI becomes... Read more »

The post Think tank calls for AI incident reporting system appeared first on AI News.
title: Think tank calls for AI incident reporting system
